106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7 admin 2022-03-20 19:46:28 7f8ff52eff120110456d766cf43bf193 18 global admin 2022-03-30 18:01:09 sys_hub_step_instance 7f8ff52eff120110456d766cf43bf193 400 sys_variable_value admin 2022-03-20 19:46:29 009ff92eff120110456d766cf43bf155 0 admin 2022-03-20 19:46:29 35aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375 f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4 sys_hub_step_instance 7f8ff52eff120110456d766cf43bf193 600 sys_variable_value admin 2022-03-20 19:46:29 489ff92eff120110456d766cf43bf155 17 admin 2022-03-30 18:01:09 (function execute(inputs, outputs) { outputs.error = false; outputs.error_message = ''; outputs.notes = ''; var totalCount = 0; var deletedCount = 0; try { var helper = new global.CMDBDataManagerHelper(); var taskGlideRecord = inputs.task; var taskSysId = taskGlideRecord.getUniqueValue(); totalCount = helper.getCiCount(taskSysId); var batchSize = helper.getBatchSize(); var batchCount = helper.getBatchCount(totalCount, batchSize); var startIndex = 0; var endIndex = batchSize var sysIds = []; //get the related table name var taskToDocumentTable = helper.getTaskToCiTableByTaskId(taskSysId); if (JSUtil.nil(taskToDocumentTable)) throw "No taskToDocumentTable found for the policy id: "+taskGlideRecord.policy_id; var relatedTable = helper.getRelatedTabelName(taskSysId, taskToDocumentTable); if (JSUtil.nil(relatedTable)) throw "No related table found for the policy id: "+taskGlideRecord.policy_id; while (batchCount > 0) { sysIds = helper.getTaskToDocumentSysIds(startIndex, endIndex, taskSysId, taskToDocumentTable); helper.deleteRelatedTableCIs(relatedTable, sysIds); deletedCount += sysIds.length; startIndex = endIndex; endIndex = endIndex + batchSize; batchCount--; } } catch(e) { outputs.error = true; outputs.error_message = e.getMessage(); } finally { outputs.notes = "Summary - Total Related Table Items Count:" + totalCount + " Deleted Count:" + deletedCount + " Failed Count:" + (totalCount - deletedCount); } })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b task 7f8ff52eff120110456d766cf43bf193 admin 2022-03-20 19:46:29 449ff92eff120110456d766cf43bf156 0 admin 2022-03-20 19:46:29 var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_7f8ff52eff120110456d766cf43bf193

106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7 admin 2022-03-20 19:59:58 ada282eeff120110456d766cf43bf112 16 global admin 2022-03-30 18:01:17 sys_hub_step_instance ada282eeff120110456d766cf43bf112 400 sys_variable_value admin 2022-03-20 19:59:58 39a282eeff120110456d766cf43bf136 0 admin 2022-03-20 19:59:58 35aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375 f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4 sys_hub_step_instance ada282eeff120110456d766cf43bf112 600 sys_variable_value admin 2022-03-20 19:59:58 f9a282eeff120110456d766cf43bf136 15 admin 2022-03-30 18:01:17 (function execute(inputs, outputs) { outputs.error = false; outputs.error_message = ''; outputs.notes = ''; var totalCount = 0; var deletedCount = 0; try { var helper = new global.CMDBDataManagerHelper(); var taskGlideRecord = inputs.task; var taskSysId = taskGlideRecord.getUniqueValue(); totalCount = helper.getCiCount(taskSysId); var batchSize = helper.getBatchSize(); var batchCount = helper.getBatchCount(totalCount, batchSize); var startIndex = 0; var endIndex = batchSize var sysIds = []; //get the related table name var taskToDocumentTable = helper.getTaskToCiTableByTaskId(taskSysId); if (JSUtil.nil(taskToDocumentTable)) throw "No taskToDocumentTable found for the policy id: "+taskGlideRecord.policy_id; var relatedTable = helper.getRelatedTabelName(taskSysId, taskToDocumentTable); if (JSUtil.nil(relatedTable)) throw "No related table found for the policy id: "+taskGlideRecord.policy_id; while (batchCount > 0) { sysIds = helper.getTaskToDocumentSysIds(startIndex, endIndex, taskSysId, taskToDocumentTable); helper.deleteRelatedTableCIs(relatedTable, sysIds); deletedCount += sysIds.length; startIndex = endIndex; endIndex = endIndex + batchSize; batchCount--; } } catch(e) { outputs.error = true; outputs.error_message = e.getMessage(); } finally { outputs.notes = "Summary - Total Related Table Items Count:" + totalCount + " Deleted Count:" + deletedCount + " Failed Count:" + (totalCount - deletedCount); } })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b task ada282eeff120110456d766cf43bf112 admin 2022-03-20 19:59:58 75a282eeff120110456d766cf43bf137 0 admin 2022-03-20 19:59:58 var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_ada282eeff120110456d766cf43bf112
